productlist.title: cheese pizza
productlist.description: Our world famous oven fresh pizza made to order with all organic mozzarella cheese, marinara, and topped with fresh basil. 12 inch size.

productlist.title: Pepperoni Pizza
productlist.description: Our world famous oven fresh pizza made to order with all organic mozzarella cheese, marinara, and topped all over with pepperoni. 12 inch size.

productlist.title: Meat Lovers Pizza
productlist.description: Our world famous oven fresh pizza made to order with all organic mozzarella cheese, marinara, and topped all over with pepperoni, crumbled, sausage, and bacon. 12 inch size.

productlist.title: Very Veggie Pizza
productlist.description: Our world famous oven fresh pizza made to order with all organic mozzarella cheese, marinara, and topped with an entire garden’s worth of vegetables!

productlist.title: Calzone
productlist.description: Our favorite folded dish! Filled with all organic mozzarella cheese and ricotta before being baked to perfection. Served with a side of organic marinara.

productlist.title: Cheesy Bread
productlist.description: Fresh organic mozzarella cheese over buttery, garlicky, crispy bread. What’s not to like! Six piece order.

productlist.title: Santa Cruz Organic Lemonade
productlist.description: From our friends at Santa Cruz Organic. Lemonades. Citrusy, tart, tangy— and just the right amount of sweet.  16 oz container.
